website_summaries.verdict: An attractive bench in a more traditional style. Ideal for those who need a classic option to lighten up space.
pros: Soft fabric has an indulgent feel
The trim stitching, fabric panels, and tufted lid display exceptional craftsmanship with keen attention to detail
cons: Light color may not be the best option if you have small children or pets

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, but smaller than described.
customer_reviews.text: First, the positives...I ordered the red storage bench and it looks very much as pictured -- the faux leather is a nice deep red, and not cheap looking. It was in good shape. But, the dimensions of the bench are completely inaccurate from what is included in the product description. It was off by more than two inches in height, and smaller in width as well. Since it was so much smaller, it did not cover the part of the wall we intended to use it for. Amazon needs to update the description to accurately reflect the item.
customer_reviews.author: Coby M

customer_reviews.title: Just what i needed
customer_reviews.text: Several concerns with ordering one of these: - does it have enough storage...Yes (about the size of a footlocker for the military types) - does it look good...Yes (even my wife says it looks good in the bedroom) - is it sturdy because I actually plan to sit on it...Yes (I think it feels sturdy and the top is very soft on the rear end) Things I didn't expect: - The hinges prevent the lid from dropping quickly on your fingers. I like this because the top is heavy. - The overall weight is good. Meaning it stays in place and doesn't slide around when you bump it as you walk past.
customer_reviews.author: P. Chavez

customer_reviews.title: I love this bench!
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the previous posted reviews, I was a little worried that the legs wouldn't be stable but I really loved the design and look so I figured I would try it out. I'm so glad I did because the legs are so stable and line up perfectly. This bench is exactly what I wanted and fits 3 bed sheets with 4 pillow cases per set and I also keep my 2 decorative pillow in it. It's comfortable to sit on and fits nicely at the foot of my queen size bed. I love that the top doesn't need to be held up when putting things inside and that it doesn't slam down when closing it.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin B.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend...tons of space inside- I fit 6 coats and a swim bag inside our bench
customer_reviews.text: I love this lift top storage bench! Pros: +Attractive fabric- linen like, nubby texture +High quality, durable fabric +Soft, cushioned bench +Comfortable +Comes put together...you just have to put the legs on +Inside storage is phenomenal...I fit 2 wool women's pea coats, 1 men's dress coat, 1 ski coat (outer and inner layers), 2 running jackets, 3 baby hats, 1 swim bag and 1 swimsuit in the bench. I plan to force another coat to fit inside it as well. I wanted a storage bench for this reason. It definitely meets my needs! We don't have a coat closet. +Lid lifts easily and stays open! Cons- -None observed
customer_reviews.author: Reviews by Sierra

customer_reviews.title: This bench is perfect it holds several blankets
customer_reviews.text: This bench is perfect it holds several blankets, and I love the look of the style. My original purpose for the purchase was to reduce the distance that my dog was jumping up and down from my bed. Everyone that I know that has purchased doggie stairs, their dogs use them to go up and then jump down. I have a family member that had to put their dog down after it broke it's back jumping down off of a high bed. The bench is working perfectly for my dog I lay a towel over the top to prevent the tufted top from getting dirty, and I now have the extra storage as a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Pam J

customer_reviews.title: Loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: Priced it at another site (overstock) Amazon had it cheaper. Some reviews...maybe at Overstock said there was a weird smell..no weird smell..mostly just glue or new fabric..nothing a few shots of fabreze..or just overnight airing out couldn't fix. Easy to put together...screw in the 4 legs...Love it..and sooooo cute very classy looking...NOT WHITE...more of an oatmeal...or off white...which is what I wanted....might order another for a different room. No regrets - Smiling
customer_reviews.author: Kristilea

customer_reviews.title: Fair quality, one leg already broke off
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, decent storage, great for the end of my bed (usually ends up with a pile of my clothes on it😂) only complaint is one of the legs broke off a few months after we bought it due to pushing/sliding it out of the way when needed. If you pick it up to move it this should not be a problem
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Three

customer_reviews.title: Nice but their quality should have been inspected better
customer_reviews.text: Overall the bench is nice. The padding is a little stiff, but I'm not planning to sit on this for long periods. However, there was a peg missing from the bottom of one of the legs. If I had this on wood floors it would have been a major problem. Fortunately, this is sitting on carpet so i just remove the pegs from the other three legs.
customer_reviews.author: Remy Um

customer_reviews.title: Ripped very soon after purchase
customer_reviews.text: So it didn't take long for the seams to tear. I have kept it covered and plan to re-appolster. I also got new feet as these weren't too sturdy. The sewn squares are not a great idea if you plan to sit on this. If your only storing things might be fine.
customer_reviews.author: mcloring

customer_reviews.title: It works great as a toy bench and doll and stuffed animal hospital bed.
customer_reviews.text: To be fair this is probably exactly as advertised but it’s just smallish and not what I was looking for. I don’t know how it would stand up to my 245lb husband using it everyday in the entryway so I ended up using it in the playroom for storage and extra seating. My daughter uses it as a hospital bed for the stuffed animals and dolls now lol
customer_reviews.author: lewlew

customer_reviews.title: Description is not correct in Color & Height
customer_reviews.text: color is not beige it is more of a gray tone. Height shows its 19inches from the floor with the feet on, it is only 17inches from the floor with the feet on. If I didn't have this measured for the exact spot that I wanted it it would have been fine. i needed something in the brown tones & then also a certain height. I am sending it back just because it wont fit in my space with color &height, but otherwise overall I liked the bench itself. there isn't a lot of room on the inside, maybe for 2 regular size bed pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Jody H.

customer_reviews.title: Losing Buttons
customer_reviews.text: This bench is well built and sturdy with nice storage. With that said, I'm baffled at the fact that the buttons on the top keep popping off! I have lost 7 buttons so far and it looks terrible!!
customer_reviews.author: LMac

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy.
customer_reviews.text: Not only was the hinge loose on 1, but the company denied receiving the 2nd one that was returned, (it was in pieces). I had to FAX the proof of signature of receipt to Discover & turn them loose on the company to get my money back. I repaired the hinge on the one I kept, but the "leather" is worn out & I am in the process of recovering it.
customer_reviews.author: Aukele

customer_reviews.title: I loved it, the hub... not so much.
customer_reviews.text: The hubby and I are torn on this one, he says it is too small, too narrow, and doesn't like the fact that it doesn't open all the way. I really liked it. It looks great, is decent sized, and comfortable to sit on. I was able to fit blankets, sheets, pillow cases, and one medium sized comforter. He wanted to use it at the foot of our bed for linen storage, we will be using it in the living room instead as an Ottoman/table/throw and pillow storage. I am happy with this purchase, but if you are looking for lots of storage, you may want to look at something bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Decent until it ripped
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I think it's a decent enough bench. The legs aren't the most sturdy, by any means. But it has served it's purpose. However, after just 1 year, it is already starting to rip at one of the seams. It is just a decorate piece that people rarely sit on, so I feel ripping after 1 year is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Fam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for littles
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for people with kids. We purchased this because I worried about my child hitting her head on the corners of our old table. This is has been the perfect solution. It is very sturdy. The padding is soft enough so that it wouldn't bust a chin, but it's sturdy enough to provide support and even balance a glass of water. The brown is very dark, but it looks really nice. We have had it for a few months now and despite a toddler, cat, and a dog, it shows no scratches or dents. Would certainly purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Eli M

customer_reviews.title: Good overall product
customer_reviews.text: Good product , make sure internal dimensions are to your liking. We use it as a toy chest for the kids. Make sure to put pads under feet or your floors will scratch (not products fault obviously)
customer_reviews.author: Jean Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. Love the material. Only assembly was screwing on the legs. Loved that as well. There is an odor but I can live with that. Although I saw the measurements, I paid more attention to the length to ensure it was not too long or too short for my king size bed. The length is ok. What I didn't do was pay attention to the height. It's a little toy like because I have thick Sterns and Foster mattresses. Maybe if my mattresses were half the thickness it would work.
customer_reviews.author: stilldeciding

customer_reviews.title: Completes my livingroom
customer_reviews.text: I liked the looks of this storage bench . It is very sturdy. A great place for grandchildren to sit rather than the floor. Dresses up my livingroom perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: De Witte

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Addition
customer_reviews.text: This bench was perfect! Exactly what I was looking for!! Holds about 4 decorative pillows and a blanket. We tested it with having multiple people sit on it, and got up to 500 pounds (didn’t wanna go any further lol). It’s great quality and the perfect touch to our bedroom. Assembly only requires you screwing on the feet.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleigh Elle

customer_reviews.title: Not as big as i expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the wife for Christmas. All you have to do is screw the legs one. We have it under our wall mounted tv in the livin room and use it to store blankets. One of the legs in the front screwed on crooked and I'm scared if i try to straighten it too much i'll break it. I'm prone to doing that. So we left it alone. Other than the one crippled lookin leg (it's not really that bad), this thing is great. I thought it would be a bit wider, but it still holds 4 blankets for us
customer_reviews.author: adzeisler

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I can’t believe this came completely assembled and all I had to do was attach the legs. This is a great piece of sturdy furniture and it looks amazing. I may have to order another one for the other room in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: High end look without a high end price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bench for a seating area in our kitchen and possibly add a table and chairs to it to make a little kitchen table area. It is very sturdy and uses good thick durable fabrics. It is a nice size for a smaller area. My con would be I wish it was slightly taller but I am 6'0" tall. For the price you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenniferlynn

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture. Material is between dark mahogany and black. Very sturdy. I noticed the other reviews had problems with the legs. Don't know what that was about. My husband and I got all four on in less than 2 minutes. Very sturdy. Easily holds over 300 lbs (we both sat on it together).
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerCarol, RN

customer_reviews.title: Looks great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This bench looks really great for the price. The bench looks like it should have been way more expensive then it was. I use it to sit on while putting on my shoes and it holds my weight without creaking or feeling unstable. The storage inside is an added bonus and I use it to store some smaller blankets and extra bedsheets.
customer_reviews.author: Adshaw

customer_reviews.title: It is sturdy for sitting
customer_reviews.text: Its smaller that I expected and moves around constantly on my tile floor. It is sturdy for sitting. The lid only opens about 50% but it stays open. I store off season clothes in side so I only deal with the half open lid about twice a year. Wish it was bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Joette T

customer_reviews.title: A Real Bargain
customer_reviews.text: This is an elegant-looking storage bench. The legs blend in nicely with some Queen Anne furniture in my living room where I'm using this as a coffee table. Looks like real leather. Quality workmanship for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Rush

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bedroom storage
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for bedroom storage, I weigh 220# and can sit on it with no problems after 2 months. At first the legs had to be screwed in tightly as they seem to hit a snag. After that they are straight as can be. The folks who complain that they are NOT straight may not be screwing them in all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Oseas

customer_reviews.title: There is more storage inside than what it looks like on the outside
customer_reviews.text: This is a great storage bench and it looks great under the window in my living room
customer_reviews.author: Tamyra Marks

customer_reviews.title: I would love to say that I liked this purchased item
customer_reviews.text: I would love to say that I liked this purchased item, which came exactly as pictured but without the 4-legs.
customer_reviews.author: JSy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and lightning fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: The quality is very good. It is extremely sturdy. Two day shipping from CA to NJ was literally only 2 days I was really happy with that. There is a few weird black fabric clumps that won't come off so that's not so great but other than that, the legs were easy to put on and the color is true to the picture. It's also light and easy to drag from one room to another as I couldn't decide which room I wanted to use it in. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price. The fabric is thin looking, but the storage bench is a perfect size HxWxL and will hold at least three sets of sheets with a little room to spare. It's not pretty, but it's great for storage or just sitting down and changing your shoes at the door.
customer_reviews.author: Maeve

customer_reviews.title: This is shorter than expectedbut the color works well anywhere ...
customer_reviews.text: This is shorter than expectedbut the color works well anywhere. The biggest problem is the hinges. They don't allow for the lid to open fully. Being as it is so short you have to get on the floor to look inside for stored items.
customer_reviews.author: alaska

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT better than expected
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT better than expected Excellent quality and came filly assembled, just had to screw legs on!
customer_reviews.author: Philip E DiPaolo

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great toy chest
customer_reviews.text: I use this as the baby's toy chest. It's perfect. The lid stays up so there's no worries there. It blends well with living room so when baby days are over, it can be used for my stuff. Perfect height for my 1 year old granddaughter. I gave it several layers of Scotch Gard to keep little fingers from leaving marks. So far, so good!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol M.

customer_reviews.title: Attractive Piece That Does What We Need It To Do
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a dirty clothes hamper after a bathroom remodel. After extensive online and instore searching it met our needs the best since it is good looking, has a good interior size, and is raised off the floor which allows us to set it over a floor vent. The picture shows it perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly I.

customer_reviews.title: Great storage space for kid toys.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, just twist on legs. Will stay open by itself and won't slam shut. A good, roomy space. I use it for kid toys and it looks nice and is working great.
customer_reviews.author: lr

customer_reviews.title: I put two throw pillows on top of it and I love what it does for my whole dining room and ...
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my dining room next to both my dining table and my gas fireplace to give extra seating near the fire. I put two throw pillows on top of it and I love what it does for my whole dining room and kitchen area. It looks great, has some storage ability and seems sturdy and functional. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MoonOverSangha

customer_reviews.title: It's VERY sturdy though. I would recommend this product for a ...
customer_reviews.text: No issues with the product. Only problem that I personally have is NOT much storage space. It's VERY sturdy though. I would recommend this product for a SMALL area.
customer_reviews.author: B StigWilk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Storage: This ottoman is perfect to store my son's many toys at a moments notice. We can fit his tractors, golf ball set, footballs, tool set, popcorn popper, small barn, and more into this ottoman. Helps keep our living room looking clean! Function: It also opens and closes slowly which makes it safe and easy for my son (21 months) to access. High quality, durable fabric and hardware! Color: The color is true to the picture on Amazon. There was a lot of time spent reviewing and debating over the perfect ottoman for our small, rectangular shaped living room that would be classy and functional. This ottoman met our expectations and we are very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Chrystal

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: This obviously isn't the highest price, highest quality product. However, I did expect better. A few months in, one corner seam is popping loose and a couple buttons are starting to let go. Yes, I have young kids who are climbing on it regularly, but I honestly expected to get at least a year out of it before it started falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: B. Tomhave

customer_reviews.title: This looks like an expensive product
customer_reviews.text: This looks like an expensive product. I had no problems with the legs. The color and everything was as expected. It is not tan or cream colored. It's more of a taupe or an extremely light washed out grey. I store one huge fluffy king size comforter in it.
customer_reviews.author: venessa

customer_reviews.title: Came as described
customer_reviews.text: Came exactly as described. Has a bit of an awful smell to it, but so does all new furniture. I’m super happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Grim

customer_reviews.title: A very nice bench
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy bench and roomy too. I placed it at the foot of my bed and store my extra sheets and pillow cases inside. My husband who is a big man even sits on it to put on this shoes and socks and it holds him up without any problem. For the price, it isn't a bad deal at all.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Colley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Storage Chest/Bench
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive chest. Well made and was just what I was looking for. The only thing that could be improved is the lid could open just a little bit further, but would not deter me from buying another one if I needed it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Y.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking!
customer_reviews.text: The one I got came with a bent peg in one of the legs. Amazon quickly replaced it and the new one is great. It looks a lot more expensive than it is. There's room inside for our 2 decorative pillows and our comforter. I wish it was a little bigger, but at this price point you can't find a bigger one that looks this nice.
customer_reviews.author: neurogeekTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I love this bench. It’s perfect in my house.
customer_reviews.text: This is so pretty, durable, easy to clean & light weight. You only have to put the feet on & it’s good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Rae B

customer_reviews.title: Color just as stated
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful. Looks wonderful at the end of my king bed.
customer_reviews.author: P. Wolff

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value..and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for...perfect fit... not too long or too wide. I love this storage bench. My husband uses it to sit on when he puts his shoes on and the dog uses it as a "boost" to get into bed. Assembly consisted of screwing on the legs. I looks very rich in the bedroom and adds an elegant touch. I would definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Spirakis

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent!! It's functional and stylish at the same time I had issues putting the legs on so I just leave it flat which works better for me
customer_reviews.author: Ms.feirce

customer_reviews.title: it looks great but my first time sitting on it and one ...
customer_reviews.text: it looks great but my first time sitting on it and one of the legs broke off.... bad workmanship on construction! I'm not sure what the weight capacity is but I was not sitting on it long enough to hold me so it must be under 250 lbs. maximum weight?
customer_reviews.author: beulah

customer_reviews.title: I like this bench.
customer_reviews.text: WOW - Best packed item i EVER have had shipped to me - AND also VERY easy to open - GOOD JOB !!! The bench is attractive at the end of our bed. Holds king size comforter (stuffed full)
customer_reviews.author: Robi

customer_reviews.title: Exceptionally solid build.
customer_reviews.text: This unit is built well and was shipped with enough padding and corner cushioning to protect it on the long trip from the Orient. The legs screw into mounting holes and the threads have enough friction that you can position each leg so the sides are lined up with the corner of the furniture.
customer_reviews.author: P. Corson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! Kids play on it and in it. Lol also fits 3 people sitting on it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: perfect storage
customer_reviews.text: Came a day late, but it's perfect! I had no problems with the legs that others mentioned. Top cushion is very firm, has good storage. I'm using it as a coffee table/extra seating. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Bought one of these and it was so nice and affordable that I bought a second one
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these and it was so nice and affordable that I bought a second one. A year later they are both still looking and working great, one for extra linens and one for band practice (cords and mics, etc.). Pretty comfortable to sit on as well as looking good.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in our living room. The color is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Chrystal

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this and have received many compliments on it
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this and have received many compliments on it, love the color and the storage area is good for storing all of my blankets....made very well for the price i paid for it..does have a slight order in it not sure what causes that...
customer_reviews.author: happy camper

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price. Quite a sturdy little bench. Even though it's not leather it looks nice and holds quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: RIZyde

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: surprisingly nice piece of furniture. Good storage and look nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: I would of had alot of expense to return it and had to have a handyman reinforce the leg and attached it better than the origina
customer_reviews.text: I was not aware that the legs sit at a slight angle. Wish they were straight up. When I received this item one of the legs was ready to collapse. I would of had alot of expense to return it and had to have a handyman reinforce the leg and attached it better than the original design and hopefully it will be ok. With this design it is possible that another leg could fail as the as the leg attachment is very weak. The screw on the leg should be screwed into a solid metal frame section on the corner an it is not.
customer_reviews.author: Donna R

customer_reviews.title: As I expected
customer_reviews.text: It's a great storage bench. However, the smell inside is bad.. need air freshener or purifier to detox it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVELY piece
customer_reviews.text: love this. easy to put legs on, feels heavy/legit and is a great storage solution for my boots! doesn't show pet hair, sturdy enough to sit on regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Horner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it, just the right size for under the window in the office.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Homelegance Lift Top Storage Bench
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and rich looking. Good quality and good price. Great storage place and place to sit or place blankets.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful storage ottoman
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful storage ottoman, but unfortunately I had to reinforce the legs because they became wobbly from being scooted across the room.
customer_reviews.author: The Larkin Clan

customer_reviews.title: Storage bench
customer_reviews.text: I love this - it sits at the end of the bed - I can sit on it to put my shoes on in the morning as it is sturdy and it holds extra bedding. Well made for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customert Templeton gal

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the color
customer_reviews.text: Verygood quality for the money. Disappointed in the color, tho. Thought it was supposed to be a beige color, and it actually has more of a gray cast to it..
customer_reviews.author: KRS

customer_reviews.title: it,s made good
customer_reviews.text: put at the foot of my bed and for storage and just to look good.
customer_reviews.author: MARGIE CLEMONS-TERRY

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bench was delivered quickly and easy to put together. Seems very sturdy. We purchased it to match some very nice teak and linen chairs. It matched not only in color but looks very well made and fits with the furniture. A good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Do not be afraid to order the quality is great and not to wide
customer_reviews.text: Do not be afraid to order the quality is great and not to wide, I'm very happy with this purchased
customer_reviews.author: Martha e de la Madrid

customer_reviews.title: Damaged!!! Very bummed
customer_reviews.text: Bench seat has some type of silver writing/squiggles on it and several scratches in the material. Was excited and chose this because of good reviews and am VERY disappointed
customer_reviews.author: lins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for storage.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these to store kids games inside. They were perfect for the space I had.
customer_reviews.author: WJS

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality and easy to assemble since only the feet ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality and easy to assemble since only the feet need to be screwed on. It's a neutral color which seems to go with all the colors in my room (teal, beige, white, and black).
customer_reviews.author: Lynny

customer_reviews.title: Love the look.
customer_reviews.text: This item is perfect for the entrance way in my house. We needed somewhere to sit and remove or put on work shoes that we didn't want the carpet exposed to. I also like the fact that there is storage inside the bench. It looks great sitting in the entrance way and we can also use it for extra seating if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Romine

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this storage bench. And it goes beautifully with the headboard, although they are not a matched set.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Homelegance 4730PU LlIFT TOP STORAGE BENCH WITH TUFFED ACCENTS
customer_reviews.text: Attractive, functional and comfoirtable. It arrived on time and in good condition. The legs were the only thing to put together....this was quite easy. It looks very nice at te foot of my bed
customer_reviews.author: Mags

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Strong
customer_reviews.text: I am loving my new Storage Bench. The quality is good. The texture is nice. Big and deep storage area.
customer_reviews.author: Mdeo

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of the chest. But it is deceiving. It will hold two small blankets, or one blanket and small pillow. I wish it held as much as it appears.
customer_reviews.author: lprewitt

customer_reviews.title: This is such a nice storage bench
customer_reviews.text: This is such a nice storage bench. It is just the right color to accent any room, Lots of storage space.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: better ones at Ross and Homegood store for less money
customer_reviews.text: its ok - very hard to put on legs - ordered the brown but it looks black - found nicer - better ones at Ross and homegood store for $ 100
customer_reviews.author: Amiee Baker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble ... well packaged! Shipped fast ! Looks awesome !! Worth the price !!
customer_reviews.author: Mobilett

customer_reviews.title: Great bench
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and well made and looks good. So far we have enjoyed owning this. We store our couch throws and extra pillows in it. I would recommend it or buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Citizen_TM

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Just about what we expected, suits our needs just fine. Quality is okay and size is good for our guest bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: diana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and deep enough to store my clothes. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be ok value. The color is definitely ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be ok value. The color is definitely much lighter than I expected. More of an ivory than a khaki
customer_reviews.author: Stacy W.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bench
customer_reviews.text: Super cute bench!! Looks just like the picture, but I had issues with the shipping. It was shipped late, so it came a little later than expected (a few days), but if you aren't in a hurry this bench is great!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Good Bench for the Price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a great storage bench. Enough room for storage. Assembly was very easy. Only complaint was one of our legs fit oddly, but we just placed that side of bench against wall so it is not noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Anm504

customer_reviews.title: Fits nicely at end of my queen size bed very sturdy ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely at end of my queen size bed very sturdy to sit on perfect for my dog to use to help her get on the bef
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this Bench!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bench!! Goes perfectly with the decor in the spare bedroom, great for storing the extra bedding. Will probably buy another one. My only complaint is it took 2 weeks to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice looking
customer_reviews.text: This product came quick and was a breeze to assemble. My only problem is that the legs seem a bit slanted. I'll have to take another look to see if I did something incorrect while putting them on. But, overall, it is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: e_archambeau

customer_reviews.title: coffee table
customer_reviews.text: I've had this a few months now. Still looks good, does what it suppose to. I use it as a coffee table.
customer_reviews.author: joanne

customer_reviews.title: Great bench.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little bench. It's exactly as pictured. The lid opens nicely and it's sturdy enough to sit on it. The fabric feels very unnatural, very synthetic but this doesn't matter to me. All in all it well meets my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: JWC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This is a super storage bench - well designed and better than advertised. I would recommend this to anyone for a nice storage bench. We use it at the bottom of our bed to put extra clothing etc.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: very attractive like pic on web
customer_reviews.text: very attractive like pic on web. Corners of the foam top arrived very sunken in... but after a week they have seemed to fill back out to an acceptable level.
customer_reviews.author: Val Brown

customer_reviews.title: One of the decorative buttons on top is loose & ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the decorative buttons on top is loose & not sure if we can fix it. The material under the lid would have to be pulled off to get to it in the first place..
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This item was just what I was looking for. Nice fabric and looks very long wearing. Perfect at the foot of the bed for storage and sitting to put on my shoes.
customer_reviews.author: George J. Vernau

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Have only had it for less than two months now and it’s already started to break...
customer_reviews.author: Pia lopez

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice piece and so affordable! Seems like great quality and the legs just screwed right on!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley McCabe

customer_reviews.title: Nice value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I really like this bench! The build quality is decent, the style of it works well with our furniture and I really like the storage space it offers. We have it in our master bedroom at the foot of our bed. I use it almost every morning for putting my shoes on since our bed sits kind of high. I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Romig

product_meta.title: Homelegance Lift Top Storage Bench with Tufted Accents, Beige Fabric
feature_bullets: Beige linen-like fabric upholstered ottoman/bench in dark espresso leg finish
Stylish button tufted lift top with easy storage, traditional turned feet
Measures at 42 x 17 x 19H inches; assemble legs required
Padded top for foot rest or extra seating
Also available in faux leather brown (4730PU), faux leather red (4730RED), faux leather purple (4730PPE), faux leather purple (4730PPE)
